mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS usage_count , SUM(use_time) AS usage_minute , SUM(use_distance) AS usage_meter , round(SUM(use_distance)/1000*0.232, 1) AS carbon_reduction FROM kickboard_svc.t_svc_use WHERE 1=1 AND user_no=#{user_no} AND DATE(use_start_dt)>=#{start_dt}

SELECT a.use_no , a.use_distance , a.use_time , a.use_start_dt , a.use_end_dt , b.pay_datetime , IFNULL(CASE WHEN b.PAYMETHOD_CODE = 'C' THEN b.PAY_COST END, 0) AS card_pay , IFNULL(CASE WHEN b.PAYMETHOD_CODE = 'P' THEN b.PAY_COST END, 0) AS point_pay FROM kickboard_svc.t_svc_use a, kickboard_svc.T_SVC_USE_PAY b WHERE 1=1 AND a.use_no = b.use_no AND user_no=#{user_no} AND DATE(a.use_start_dt)>=#{start_dt} ORDER BY a.use_start_dt DESC
